argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplsca.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | mplsca.i | |- ( ph -> I e. V ) |
| 3 |  | mplsca.r | |- ( ph -> R e. W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer R ) = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 5 | 4, 2, 3 | #P_psrsca | |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` P ) e. _V |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` P ) = ( Base ` P ) |
| 8 | 1, 4, 7 | #P_mplval2 | |- P = ( ( I mPwSer R ) |`s ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( Scalar ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_resssca | |- ( ( Base ` P ) e. _V -> ( Scalar ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( Scalar ` P ) ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( Scalar ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( Scalar ` P ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` P ) ) |
